meanings.definition: The act of submerging something in a liquid.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching the dunkings of cookies in milk.
meanings.sent2: The dunkings of the tea bag in hot water made a soothing drink.
meanings.sent3: The dunkings of the toy boat in the bathtub made it sail faster.
meanings.sent4: Her dunkings of the paintbrush in water created beautiful watercolor paintings.
meanings.sent5: The dunkings of the bread in the soup made it soft and flavorful.

meanings.definition: The act of dipping a food item into a liquid.
meanings.sent1: The chocolate fountain was perfect for dunkings of fruits.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the dunkings of his fries in ketchup.
meanings.sent3: The dunkings of the donut in coffee made it taste even better.
meanings.sent4: Her dunkings of the pretzel in cheese sauce were delicious.
meanings.sent5: The dunkings of the apple slices in caramel were a hit at the party.

meanings.definition: The act of plunging or immersing something forcefully.
meanings.sent1: The sudden dunkings of the diver into the pool surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The chef's quick dunkings of the pasta in boiling water were impressive.
meanings.sent3: The dunkings of the basketball into the hoop were perfectly timed.
meanings.sent4: His dunkings of the brush in paint created bold strokes on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The dunkings of the swimmer into the cold water took everyone's breath away.
